name: dataapps-minimal-template
description: Minimal DataApps template with FastAPI backend

scripts._comment_dev: Development scripts - customize these for your project
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts._comment_production: Production scripts - used by Databricks Apps
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && uv run python main.py
scripts._comment_quality: Code quality and testing (add when you need them)
scripts.lint: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && uv run ruff check . --fix

_comment_dependencies: Add frontend dependencies when you create a frontend

devDependencies._comment: No frontend dependencies in minimal template - add as needed

_examples._comment: Examples of what you might add for different frontend frameworks
